title: Red Riding Ashe - Skin Idea
body:
http://filoinfinito.es/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/lol__red_ashe_by_ippus-d5jc5n3.jpg

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-h8MasRMuyR8/Ue8uoFK64AI/AAAAAAAAB5c/yeSRzNYBkjo/s1600/Red_Ashe.jpg

http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2011/174/8/2/red_rider_ashe_by_miyao_n-d3jt21s.png

Tbh I love red riding hood and I believe ashe deserves it so much, she matches to become an adult version of Red Riding. I picture flaming arrows and a tree popping out as her recall (x

replies.body: I saw someone cosplay this, and it looked awesome!

how did you know it was Ashe? lol

Shouldve gotten a picture to show us :( I'm wondering what way she cosplayed as Red Riding Ashe
i love the idea but heartseeker to similar would rather have red riding ashe then heartseeker either way. she has black amethyst red white green needs liek a yellow or deep blue.

> [{quoted}](name=Mahnigguh,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=amBU0aRA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-06T19:01:51.377+0000)
>
> i love the idea but heartseeker to similar would rather have red riding ashe then heartseeker either way. she has black amethyst red white green needs liek a yellow or deep blue.

I don't really see heartseeker being similar to Red Riding due to the fact that Red Riding will be a Fiery looking skin. Plus heartseeker should be a legacy just like they do with halloween idk why its still free to be able to buy.
